item.description:
This is Posted on Social Hourz and Sheri's Travel site too.

Join us for an evening of Dinner & Dancing

When: Friday, January 9, 2008

Time: 7:30 p.m. until 12:30 pm

Place: Georgina's Restaurant & Banquet Facility

DJ: "Into The Groove"

Cost: $31/person* (includes tax & service charge)

*Sheri has arranged a special price for our Group
(Normal price is $37.50/person)


~DEADLINE TO SIGN UP/PREPAY IS 1/6/09~


Buffet Selections:

* International Cheese and Crackers
* Fresh Fruit and Vegetable Platter with Dip
* Garden Salad
* Caesar Salad
* Fresh Baked Breads
* Baked Ham with side of Raisin Sauce
* Roasted Chicken
* Baked Stuff Sole
* Tortellini Primavera
* Roast Sirloin Carving Station
* Mini Pastries, Italian Cookies, Cakes & Pies

To make your payment, please contact:
Mavourneen at 860-647-0345*
MC and Visa accepted

*Remember to say that you're with Sheri's Group to get the
special discounted price
item.how_to_find_us: To make your payment, please contact: Mavourneen at 860-647-0345* MC and Visa ac
